Articles.Content:
After all of the KSP2 stuff, I decided to try to get back into some KSP1 to prepare/relearn the basics.
I reinstalled KSP from steam and pressed Play.

The launcher pops up, loads the KSP and upon when I hit play in the launcher, there's a bit of loading, I am met with this popup: 

 

I've tried fully uninstalling KSP with RevoUninstaller, turning off overlays, updating GPU drivers, reinstalling c++ distributables. Not really sure where to go from here.

 

Crash Log Files: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1kZcVfo8IAYD78oQtldG_Zm_0N7Asd8dd?usp=sharing
